attributes.action: Make Council and Highways depts regularly prune back unruly trees and branches in Public areas where is affects the day to day life of people. (Overhanging branches on footpaths)
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We are struggling to make Kent County Council listen to our request to prune back the trees in our road, or cut them down. 
We have 10 very large trees in a small road, and the roots will eventually, if they have not already, grow under the houses and will affect the foundations, the branches are also overhanging the public footpaths, and the roots are breaking the footpath, but so far the council have deemed it not a health and safety hazard.
